name: Quack-A-Moley
description:
Defend your avocados against huge moles! Use PLANKS, WATERHOSE and, EXPLOSIONS to keep them out and of course quack them off with your HAMMER!

Made in one week on Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1 in team of four:

Gentlemanni - programming + design
Assault&Battery - art + design
Cedric.v - programming
nh490 - sound
